#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 quarterfinals : England beats Sweden , Croatia knocks out hosts Russia
#Text=Tuesday , July 10 , 2018
#Text=On Saturday , England defeated Sweden 2 – 0 in the FIFA football World Cup quarter-finals and the hosts Russia lost to Croatia 3 – 4 on penalties .
#Text=Croatia are to play England for the spot in the finals .
#Text=Sweden vs England
#Text=Sweden faced England at the Samara Arena .
#Text=England had higher ball possession .
#Text=English forward Harry Kane missed a chance to open the scoring from outside the penalty area in the 19th minute from Raheem Sterling 's assist .
#Text=The English side scored the first goal in the 30th minute as Harry Maguire scored a header from Ashley Young 's assist .
#Text=It was Maguire 's first goal in an international match .
#Text=Sterling had an opportunity in the 45th minute to double the lead for England , but his shot was blocked .
#Text=The first half ended with Sweden trailing by one goal .
#Text=In the second half , Sweden got a chance to equalise , but England 's goalkeeper Jordan Pickford saved Marcus Berg 's header .
#Text=Just before the one-hour mark , Jesse Lingard assisted Dele Alli , and Alli scored a goal from a header , doubling the lead for England .
#Text=Marcus Berg 's attempt to open the scoring for Sweden from John Guidetti 's assist was blocked by Pickford .
#Text=Lingard had a chance to triple the lead in the 82nd minute from Harry Kane 's assist but was blocked .
#Text=In the 85th minute , England made a substitution when Eric Dier replaced Jordan Henderson .
#Text=The match ended 2 – 0 as England advanced to the semi-finals .
#Text=After the match , England 's coach Gareth Southgate said , " I ca n't speak highly enough of the whole squad and whole group of staff because it is so united in there .

#Text=Dalić added ,  Of course there is some power left for the English .
